BROKEN.NAME: Broken
BROKEN.DESC: Block dice have -{stacks} to rolls this round.

DISHONORABLE.NAME: Dishonorable
DISHONORABLE.DESC:
A sacred duel has been broken!
Enemies will prioritize attacking this unit until it dies.

DUEL_TO_THE_DEATH.NAME: Duel to the Death
DUEL_TO_THE_DEATH.DESC:
{owner} and {APPLIER_NAME} are locked in a duel!
If either character attacks anyone else, removes Duel to the Death from EVERYONE and inflict Dishonorable on the attacker.

HASTE.NAME: Haste
HASTE.DESC: On round start, increase the Speed of {owner}'s actions by {stacks}, then remove all Haste.

NEXT_ROUND_ACTION_GAIN.NAME: Next Round Action Gain
NEXT_ROUND_ACTION_GAIN.DESC: On round start, gain {stacks} additional action(s).

NEXT_ROUND_STATUS_GAIN.NAME: Next Round {STATUS_NAME}
NEXT_ROUND_STATUS_GAIN.DESC: On round start, gain {stacks} stack(s) of {STATUS_NAME}.

POISE_PROTECTION.NAME: Poise Protection
POISE_PROTECTION.DESC: Incoming Poise damage is reduced by {stacks} this round.

PROTECTION.NAME: Protection
PROTECTION.DESC: Incoming damage is reduced by {stacks} this round.

SLOW.NAME: Slow
SLOW.DESC: On round start, reduce the Speed of {owner}'s actions by {stacks}, then remove all Slow.

STAGGERED.NAME: Staggered
STAGGERED.DESC:
Cannot take actions. Incoming damage is doubled.
This effect wears off at the end of round {UNSTAGGER_ROUND}.

STRENGTH.NAME: Strength
STRENGTH.DESC: Attack dice have +{stacks} to rolls this round.
